query.name: org.billingsschools.midas.grading_scales
query.sql: select distinct gradescaleitem.dcid "id" , gradescaleitem.name "name" , gradescaleitem.name "abbr" , gradescaleitem.description "description" , '' "district_id" , school_course.schoolid "school_id" , '1' "is_print" , gradescaleitem.isforstandards "use_as_rubric" from gradescaleitem left join courses on courses.gradescaleid = gradescaleitem.id left join school_course on school_course.courseid = courses.id where gradescaleitem.gradescaleid = -1 and gradescaleitem.gradescaletype != 'SPECIAL' and gradescaleitem.dcid != 1 and school_course.schoolid is not null and school_course.schoolid not in (79438) order by gradescaleitem.dcid
